TopicTitle: Inflatable Hab de-flated and made crew non functional

Articles.Content:
Which mod are you using?

Does the context menu appear with out the expected button or not at all?

change 

 guiActive = False

to 

 guiActive = True

just a guess..

> 
> Which mod are you using?
> Does the context menu appear with out the expected button or not at all?

context menu appears but without the button 

> 
> change 
>  guiActive = False
> 
> to 
> 
>  guiActive = True
> 
> just a guess..

will try your suggestion

@philotical 

OMG!!@!!!!! THAT WORKED!!!!!!! \*YELLING LOUD\* thank you so much ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) You are awarded a chocolate kerbal!
